subject: Re: [junit] Junit Test Cases
msgSnippet: hi iam a student.iam supposed to test an Rmi communication interface with junit.anybody can help me by giving some sample testcases. which helps me to write
messageBody:
hi iam a student.iam supposed to test an Rmi communication interface with junit.anybody can help me by giving some sample testcases. which helps me to write test cases for my code execute them.
thanks
krishna.

Praveen AH <praveen_maduray@...> wrote:
Hi All,
I am praveen doing Integration Unit Testing Using Junit Testing Tool. I am aware of writing test scripts using junit tool. I have a doubt Do you write seperate Test Case in a word document for Integration Testing ?.If yes can you please send some sample of Test Case wherein you write Test Case Description, Test CaseID & Test Result.

Thanks & regards
Praveen
